Question: Dame Elizabeth Rosemond "Liz" this person, DBE (February 27, 1932 – March 23, 2011) was a British-American actress.
Hints: Berens insisted that Sara take this person to see Cowden who, she assured, would be dazzled by her breathtaking beauty.
Unlike some other child actors, this person made an easy transition to adult roles.
By this point this person was married for the fifth time, to Richard Burton.
